briefTitle: Sulopenem Versus Ertapenem for Complicated Intra-abdominal Infection (cIAI)
officialTitle: Prospective, Phase 3, Randomized, Multi-center, Double-blind Study of Efiicacy, Tolerability & Safety of Sulopenem & Sulopenem-etzadroxil/Probenecid vs Ertapenem Followed by Cipro-metronidazole for Treatment of cIAI in Adults
summary: This is a prospective, Phase 3, randomized, multi-center, double-blind study of the efficacy, tolerability and safety of sulopenem followed by sulopenem-etzadroxil/probenecid versus ertapenem followed by ciprofloxacin-metronidazole for treatment of complicated intra-abdominal infections in adults.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Clinical Success
